amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to amend Federal securities laws to allow 403(b) plans to invest in collective investment trusts (CITs) and insurance contracts that currently may be invested in by comparable retirement plans, such as 401(k)s.
amendment.purpose: Amendment modifies Federal securities laws to allow 403(b) plans to invest in collective investment trusts (CITs) and insurance contracts that currently may be invested in by comparable retirement plans, such as 401(k)s.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lucas amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 301 - 125 (Roll no. 70).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lucas amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 301 - 125 (Roll no. 70).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lucas amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 301 - 125 (Roll no. 70).
